summary: Dr. Peter P. Chiang faced disciplinary charges for failing to meet quality medical care standards and maintain adequate medical records, specifically regarding inappropriate opioid prescribing. These issues led to a Consent Order imposing a reprimand, probation, and a permanent ban on prescribing most Controlled Dangerous Substances. Ultimately, Dr. Chiang voluntarily surrendered his medical license effective June 1, 2019, stating he no longer wished to comply with the Consent Order's terms.
